snippet: Stocks closed higher on Friday after a stronger-than-expected payrolls report gave traders confidence that the economy could withstand a scaling back of the Federal Reserve’s stimulus.
lead_paragraph: Stocks closed higher on Friday after a stronger-than-expected payrolls report gave traders confidence that the economy could withstand a scaling back of the Federal Reserve’s stimulus.

headline.main: Wall Street Closes Higher After Release of Jobs Data
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Closes Higher After Release of Jobs Data
